channel.title: Cloud communications on FinanClub

item.title: ERIC
item.description: score:-44 Chances: The proliferation of 5G wireless technology has been a positive catalyst for computer networking stocks. Vonage, a part of Ericsson, has recently won the National Innovation Award for Guest Experience, showcasing the company’s capabilities in cloud communications. Three Ireland and Orange Spain have selected Ericsson to implement and deploy 5G networks, indicating growing demand for the company’s products and services in the telecom sector.
